data: OB Intrauterine Pressure Catheter (IUPC) with or without Intrapartum Amnioinfusion
Refer to Intrauterine Pressure Catheter (IUPC): Uterine Activity Monitoring and Amnioinfusion Policy
The following conditions must be met for placement of an IUPC:  - Membranes must be ruptured  - The patient's cervix must be sufficiently dilated to allow passage of the IUPC
Monitor fluids through IUPC during intrapartum amnioinfusion
Observe and document q15min the following - see order comment
300 mL, intrauteral, once, administer over: 20 minute, drug form: bag
order rate: 100 mL/h, intrauteral, drug form: bag
order rate: 150 mL/h, intrauteral, drug form: bag
order rate: 200 mL/h, intrauteral, drug form: bag
